Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video shows a landslide in Sri Lanka when it actually shows a landslide in Indonesia.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on false information.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video shows a landslide in Sri Lanka without verifying the information.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim has an alternative explanation that the video shows a landslide in Indonesia, which is supported by evidence from Indonesian media outlets.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of exaggeration in the claim.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement in the claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times.
